thread.title: Change Your Carreer Now!

title: Change Your Carreer Now!
text:
Region : Gauteng / Johannesburg / Soweto   
COMPANY REQUIRES MOTIVATED INDIVIDUALS TO JOIN THEIR DYNAMIC TEAM. R15 400 Salary Package. Bonuses + above average commission. Full company training provided. No Experience   OWN VEHICLE and drivers license is a MUST!   presentable! Have to stay in GAUTENG or close to the EAST RAND! For an interview call 011 869 6345 which will give you the fastest result or sms name and contact number to 0725986489 and we will call you back. Alternative you can send your CV via email to alberton.medical@gmail.com
